feed.title: Azure Architecture Center
feed.subtitle: Updated articles for Azure Architecture Center

entry.title: Extract and analyze call center data by using Azure OpenAI Service, Speech services, and Language services
entry.summary: Learn how to extract insights from customer conversations at a call center by using Azure AI services and Azure OpenAI Service.

entry.title: Mission-critical baseline with App Service
entry.summary: Learn how to deploy mission-critical web applications by using the Web Apps feature of Azure App Service.

entry.title: Ingest and store medical data in Azure
entry.summary: Create a data store to search and filter medical data by using Azure Data Factory pipelines with preingestion and postingestion validation pipelines.

entry.title: Prevent IPv4 exhaustion in Azure
entry.summary: Minimize private address space consumption when you build large networks in Azure. This article presents two methods to create more IPv4 address space.

entry.title: Reliable web app pattern for Java - Apply the pattern
entry.summary: Apply the reliable web app pattern for Java to your web app. Find essential implementation guidance for web apps moving to the cloud. Learn how to update (re-platform) web apps to be successful in the cloud.

entry.title: Reliable web app pattern for Java - Plan the implementation
entry.summary: Plan the implementation of the reliable web app pattern for Java. Find essential design guidance for web apps moving to the cloud. Learn how to update (re-platform) web apps to be successful in the cloud.

entry.title: Reliable web app pattern
entry.summary: Learn about the reliable web app pattern.

entry.title: Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) considerations for multitenancy
entry.summary: This article describes the features of Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) that are useful when working with multitenanted systems. It links to guidance and examples for how to use AKS in a multitenant solution.

entry.title: Deploy AD DS in an Azure virtual network
entry.summary: Learn how to extend an on-premises Active Directory domain to Azure in order to provide distributed authentication services.

entry.title: Azure DNS Private Resolver
entry.summary: Use Azure DNS Private Resolver to simplify hybrid recursive domain name system (DNS) resolution for on-premises and Azure workloads.

entry.title: Resiliency checklist for services
entry.summary: Resiliency is the ability to recover from failures and continue to function. Use this checklist to review the resiliency considerations for Azure services.

entry.title: Make all things redundant
entry.summary: Use these recommendations to avoid having single points of failure, by building redundancy into your application.

entry.title: Failure mode analysis
entry.summary: Get information about doing a failure mode analysis (FMA) for cloud solutions that are based on Azure.

entry.title: Citizen AI with Power Platform
entry.summary: Learn how to use Azure Machine Learning and Microsoft Power Platform to quickly create a machine learning proof of concept and a production version.

entry.title: Cyber threat intelligence in Microsoft Sentinel
entry.summary: Import threat indicators, view logs, and create rules to generate security alerts and incidents, and visualize threat intelligence data with Microsoft Sentinel.

entry.title: Choose an Azure data service
entry.summary: Use this guide to decide which data service best suits your application.

entry.title: Azure Sandbox
entry.summary: Accelerate your Azure project with a fully functional sandbox environment that includes virtual networks, virtual machines, and databases.

entry.title: Microsoft SaaS stories
entry.summary: Collection of insightful interviews featuring Microsoft partners who have embarked on their unique software as a service (SaaS) journey.

entry.title: Azure Database for PostgreSQL considerations for multitenancy
entry.summary: This article describes the features of Azure Database for PostgreSQL that are useful when working with multitenanted systems, and it provides links to guidance and examples.

entry.title: Multi-region load balancing
entry.summary: Learn how to build an Azure system that serves web and non-web workloads with resilient multi-tier applications in multiple Azure regions.

entry.title: Azure Spring Apps (ASA) architecture design
entry.summary: Get started on your Azure Spring Apps journey by reviewing guidance ranging from "just starting out" to production.

entry.title: WordPress on App Service
entry.summary: Use Azure Front Door, Azure App Service, and other Azure services to deploy a highly scalable and secure installation of WordPress.

entry.title: WordPress on Azure Kubernetes Service
entry.summary: Use Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) to deploy a highly scalable and secure installation of WordPress that's a good fit for large, storage-intensive applications.

entry.title: WordPress on virtual machines
entry.summary: Use Azure Front Door, Azure Virtual Machine Scale Sets, and other Azure services to deploy a highly scalable and secure installation of WordPress.

entry.title: WordPress on Azure
entry.summary: Learn about multiple options for hosting WordPress on Azure. See guidance and tips for deploying a secure, scalable, and cost-effective WordPress installation.

entry.title: Deploy web apps by using zone-redundant Azure Red Hat OpenShift
entry.summary: Run an application on Azure Red Hat OpenShift in a zone-redundant configuration to achieve high availability.

entry.title: Monitor a distributed system by using Application Insights and OpenCensus
entry.summary: Learn how to monitor an end-to-end distributed system by using OpenCensus for Python and Application Insights.

entry.title: Deploy Autodesk Maya on a virtual machine
entry.summary: See how Autodesk Maya performs on an Azure virtual machine. Maya provides 3D animation, modeling, simulation, and rendering capabilities.

entry.title: Offline audio dubbing
entry.summary: Use Azure Cognitive Services AI tools to automate the offline dubbing process and ensure a high-quality dubbed version of original input.

entry.title: Deploy LAMMPS on an Azure virtual machine
entry.summary: Learn how LAMMPS classical molecular dynamics software performs on single-node and multi-node Azure virtual machine configurations.

entry.title: Build language model pipelines with memory
entry.summary: Learn how to use an AI/ML pipeline, LangChain, and language models to create an analysis of how your product compares to competitor's similar products.

entry.title: Implement Azure DevOps for mainframe applications that use IBM Z and Cloud Modernization Stack
entry.summary: Implement Azure DevOps for z/OS mainframe applications that use IBM Z and Cloud Modernization Stack.

entry.title: Siemens Teamcenter baseline architecture on Azure
entry.summary: Learn about the Siemens Teamcenter product lifecycle management (PLM) solution architecture on Azure.

entry.title: DataOps for autonomous vehicle operations
entry.summary: Use Azure services to build an offline data operations and data management (DataOps) solution for an automated driving system.

entry.title: Use Teamcenter PLM with Azure NetApp Files
entry.summary: Learn how to use Azure NetApp Files as a storage solution for Siemens Teamcenter product lifecycle management (PLM).

entry.title: Carrier-grade voicemail solution on Azure
entry.summary: An example of a carrier-grade solution design that focuses on highly reliability using Azure services.

entry.summary: Learn how Altair EDEM discrete element method (DEM) software performs on an Azure virtual machine (VM).

entry.summary: Find out how the Samadii Plasma particle-based application performs on an Azure virtual machine (VM).

entry.summary: Find out how Samadii DEM, a discrete element method solver, performs on an Azure virtual machine (VM).

entry.summary: Find out how Samadii SCIV (Statistical Contact in Vacuum) performs on an Azure virtual machine (VM).

entry.title: Implement TIC 3.0 compliance
entry.summary: Implement Trusted Internet Connection (TIC) 3.0 compliance for your internet-facing Azure applications and services, and improve the user experience.

entry.title: Model loan credit risk and default probability
entry.summary: Use Azure Machine Learning, Azure Synapse Analytics, App Service, and Power BI to model loan credit risk and default probability.

entry.summary: Learn about Cognitive Services Decision APIs, which can help you make recommendations for decision-making, and Applied AI Services, which provides NLP features.

entry.summary: Learn about using Azure Cognitive Service for Language to understand and analyze text. Learn which service to use for a specific use case.

entry.summary: Learn about the Azure Cognitive Services Speech service, which provides speech-to-text and text-to-speech capabilities.

entry.summary: Learn about using Cognitive Service for Vision to understand and analyze images and video. Learn which service to use for a specific use case.

entry.summary: Learn how to contextualize data by looking up context that's stored in a graph database in SQL Database.

entry.summary: Learn how Autodesk Revit building information modeling software performs on an Azure virtual machine.

entry.summary: Reference architecture for a baseline infrastructure that deploys an Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) cluster.

entry.title: Send Databricks app logs to Azure Monitor
entry.summary: Learn how to send application logs and metrics from Azure Databricks to a Log Analytics workspace using the Azure Databricks Monitoring Library.

entry.title: Dashboards to visualize Azure Databricks metrics
entry.summary: Learn how to set up a Grafana dashboard to monitor performance of Azure Databricks jobs. Azure Databricks is an Apache Spark-based analytics service.

entry.title: AKS triage - cluster health
entry.summary: Learn to check the overall health of an Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) cluster, as part of a triage step for AKS clusters.
